title: My Pixel 5 is stuck checking for data when transferring from my iPhone XR
content: I am trying to tranfer data from my iPhone XR to my new Pixel 5 and I get stuck in "Getting ready to copy screen. I have deleted a lot of my apps to reduce the amount it requires to read and have it around 27 GB including the system on my iPhone. Yet it doesn't seem to be reading. I have done everything such as turning off iMessage, Facetime..Yet it does not copy. Can any of you help me.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
